attributes.action: provide NHS funding for students on Paramedic Science degrees.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Currently, students studying courses leading to a professional NHS registration are eligble for NHS funding from the Department of Health. These include courses leading to registation as a:

Doctor, dentist, chiropodist, podiatrist, dietician, occupational therapist, orthoptist, physiotherapist, prosthetist, orthotist, radiographer, audiologist, speech and language therapist, dental hygienist, dental therapist, nurse, midwife, and operating department practitioner.

We believe that funding should also be provided to students studying courses that lead to registration as a Paramedic. Currently there is no funding for these students, who have to pay their own tuition fees and are not eligible for NHS student bursaries.
